```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r df}
N <- 5000
df <- crossing(
  sequence=seq(10) %>% as.character(),
  p=seq(0.15,0.9,0.15),
  n=seq(N)
) %>%
  group_by(sequence, p) %>%
  mutate(X=rbinom(n=N,size=1,prob=p),
         cumsum = cumsum(X),
         p_n=cumsum/n)
```

```{r vis}
df %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x=n,y=p_n, colour=sequence)) +
  ylim(0,1) +
  facet_wrap(~p)
```
